Space Usage.name: Space Usage
Space Usage.description: The usage of space in this image, including wasted space (bytes), image efficiency, and size on disk (bytes)

Efficiency Score.name: Efficiency Score
Efficiency Score.description: A score of the percentage of non-wasted bytes in an image to the image's overall size in bytes. Interpretation of this Measure is as a score of scores.

Image Efficiency Score Diagnostic Dive.name: Image Efficiency Score Diagnostic Dive
Image Efficiency Score Diagnostic Dive.description: A score that features the ratio of non-wasted size in bytes (calculated via the difference of the overally image size in bytes subtract the value of the inefficient bytes metric) to overall image size in bytes

Efficiency Score.name: Efficiency Score
Efficiency Score.description: A score of the percentage of non-wasted bytes in an image to the image's overall size in bytes. Interpretation of this Measure is as a score of scores.

Image Efficiency Score Diagnostic Dive.name: Image Efficiency Score Diagnostic Dive
Image Efficiency Score Diagnostic Dive.description: A score that features the ratio of non-wasted size in bytes (calculated via the difference of the overally image size in bytes subtract the value of the inefficient bytes metric) to overall image size in bytes
